name: BILL_SCHED_PMT_PP_HAR_EST
description: This table contains pre-service estimates directly linked to hospital accounts that are attached to a payment plan.

columns.name: SCHED_PMT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the scheduled payment record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the estimate record associated with a hospital account on a payment plan.
